replies.body:
Do you know anyone who has been affected by mesothelioma?

In all seriousness, there's a lot to unpack here and I haven't the slightest clue where to start. For starters, your analogy of verbal abuse equating to molestation is probably one of the greatest examples of false equivalency and slippery slope that I've seen. Whereas one is a crime, the other is covered under free speech, and no laws can compel a company to enforce a standard for what people can or can't say. Additionally, with regards to lawsuits, the Terms of Use mandates that aggrieved individuals work with Riot Games through arbitration first, but even then, your argument has no grounds. But as a level 12 player talking about your experiences in ranked, you clearly switched accounts to post one hell of a troll thread.

^choking^ I am so glad I was not drinking when I read this.... still laughing... can't breathe... I'm actually crying.  Wuks, do you need an assistant?  An apprentice?  Or a maid?  A servant?  Bestow upon me the wisdom of your wit, intelligence and common sense! I do windows.
